overview: Sexual tensions are high in the office of a cosmetics company run by a married couple. In a devious move to eliminate her husband, Mrs. Amos (Jade Sin) spreads her legs and lets the adultery games, the cocks, and the DPs begin! 6 scenes including 1 duo, 2 trios (b/b/g), 1 lesbian trio, and 1 gang bang.
title: Scent of a Girl
